title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
description: The current behavior of the 'Update Test Suite' action is not clear when attempting to remove items.
OB: When selecting 'Y' in the dialog, it is not evident that 'X' will be removed.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting 'Y' in the dialog should result in the removal of 'X'.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the 'Update Test Suite' action dialog.
2. Select 'Y'.
3. Observe that 'X' is not removed as expected.
